title: Lane Detection using BiSeNet-v2
description: A lane detection system trained on the CU Lane dataset using BiSeNetV2 architecture and Discriminative Loss for clustering.

title: Face Detection
description: A program that classifies images as face or non-face using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model.

title: Style Transfer
description: A project that transforms input images into paintings with custom styles using a generative model.

title: Auto-annotation
description: A full-stack application for automatic image annotation using YOLO, developed with Flask (backend) and React (frontend).
